alert.note: Alert for Caledonia; Eastern Addison; Eastern Rutland; Eastern Windsor; Essex; Orange; Washington; Western Rutland; Western Windsor (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 22 at 3:54AM EST until January 23 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 PM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches for central through northeastern Vermont and 4 to 7 inches with localized higher amounts for Rutland and Windsor Counties. * WHERE...Essex, Caledonia, Washington, Eastern Addison, Orange, Western Rutland, Eastern Rutland, Western Windsor and Eastern Windsor Counties. * WHEN...From 7 PM Sunday to 1 PM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow is expected to develop Sunday evening. Some periods of heavy snow are possible during the early morning hours Monday especially across southern Vermont.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.

area.areaDesc: Caledonia; Eastern Addison; Eastern Rutland; Eastern Windsor; Essex; Orange; Washington; Western Rutland; Western Windsor
